name: Elegant crochet flower bolero shrug jacket pattern by marifu6a nr 15
description:
Crochet pattern "flowers bolero, shrug" by marifu6a
Skill Level: Intermediate.
Size: S-M-L
Yarn: cotton or acrylic 100gr-300mt 
Hook : 1.75mm(size S), 3mm(size M), 4mm(size L)
S: 150gr; M: 200gr; L: 250gr.
video tutorial here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XmPXZz2IfIw

This is easy to follow TUTORIAL CROCHET PATTERN with written instructions in English (US terms) completed with detailed pictures and diagrams, 20 sheets. 
The 'list of used stitches' is translated in Dutch, UK English, and Italian, French and German crochet terms. American crochet terms, with tutorial pictures showing the stitches row by row made it so much easier to work with the pattern even for the beginner.
If you know to crochet, make it! You will enjoy! :)
You are not allowed to sell, copy, distribute or share my patterns (or the pictures within it) in any form.
PDF pattern will be automatically send to yours email.
